definitions.definition: The act of reclassifying ; a second or subsequent classification .

The assignment of a high-school student to a different graduation class (either a year earlier or later than their original), often to allow a potential athlete either to develop further or to start playing professionally earlier.

main_definition: The act of reclassifying ; a second or subsequent classification .
secondary_definitions: ( education ) The assignment of a high-school student to a different graduation class (either a year earlier or later than their original), often to allow a potential athlete either to develop further or to start playing professionally earlier.
